sect1.title: Introduction

textobject.phrase: Shows Stock Ticker applet. Contains scrolling display area, back and forward buttons.

sect1.para: The &applet; applet downloads current stock quotes from the Internet and displays the quotes in a scrolling display in the applet. The applet downloads the stock information from Yahoo! Finance.

To add &applet; to a panel, right-click on the panel, then choose
Add to Panel Accessories Stock Ticker .

note.para: If your computer is located behind a firewall you must use a proxy server to run &applet; successfully. For more information about how to specify a proxy server, see .

sect1.para: &applet; displays the following information for each stock symbol that is defined in the applet preferences:

listitem.para: The stock symbol that represents the company.
The current quote.
An arrow to indicate an increase or decrease in the quote.
The amount of the increase or decrease in the quote.
The percentage of the increase or decrease in the quote.

sect2.title: To Move Forwards or Backwards in the Stock Display
sect2.para: To move forwards or backwards in the scrolling display, use the arrow buttons located at the right and left of the applet display.

sect2.title: To Add Company Stock Quotes to the Applet
sect2.para: See for information about how to add stock quotes to the applet display.

sect2.title: To Update the Display
sect2.para: &applet; automatically updates the stock information at the frequency that is specified in the applet preferences. See for more information about the applet preferences. To update the information that is displayed in the applet immediately, right-click on the applet, then choose Update.

sect2.title: To Set a Proxy Server
sect2.para:
If your computer is located behind a firewall you must use a proxy server to run &applet; successfully. To configure GNOME to use a proxy server, choose
Applications Desktop Preferences Network Proxy .

sect2.title: To Configure &applet;
sect2.para: To configure &applet;, right-click on the applet, then choose Preferences. The Stock Ticker Preferences dialog contains the following tabbed sections:

sect3.title: Symbols
sect3.para: The Symbols tabbed section enables you to add and remove stock quotes from the applet display.
To add a stock quote to the applet, perform the following steps:

listitem.para: Ascertain the stock symbol for the company.
Type the stock symbol for the company in the New Symbol text box.
Click Add to add the symbol to the list of symbols for which the applet displays quotes.
Click OK to save the change and close the dialog.

sect3.para: To remove a stock quote from the applet, perform the following steps:

listitem.para: Select the stock symbol for the company.
Click Remove Selected to remove the symbol from the list of symbols for which the applet displays quotes.
Click OK to save the change and close the dialog.
